author: Rosy Cordero
title: 'Paradise Lost': See Josh Hartnett in trailer for Spectrum Original show
description: Josh Hartnett returns to TV in the dark drama 'Paradise Lost' for Spectrum Originals.
content:
Josh Hartnett transports viewers to small town Mississippi in the first trailer for his new Spectrum Originals series Paradise Lost.
In his return to television after the conclusion of Penny Dreadful, Hartnett goes dark and mysterious for the role of Yates F… [+3540 chars]
